title: Can Anything Stop This Stock Market?
text:
Astrology has made a comeback, the New Yorker reports, as people look to the stars in a time of uncertainty. “Comeback” may not be an entirely accurate description, since the pursuit of answers via unconventional avenues never seems to go away.

Technical analysis sometimes is derided as akin to stargazing, but its practitioners assert that in price, there is truth. The market reveals truth that often contradicts the accepted wisdom and reported news. The relevant case in point here is that U.S. stocks are closing in on records,...
description: Despite signs of a weakening global economy and other unsettling news, equities keep rising in the U.S. and abroad.
